agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Culture, Recreation & Tourism TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Tuesday, May 7, 2019 PLACE: E1.014 CHAIR: Rep. John Cyrier SCR 7 Seliger Designating the second Saturday of September as Quanah Parker Day for a 10-year period beginning in 2019. SB 2182 Nelson Relating to the eligibility of certain events for funding under the Major Events Reimbursement Program. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
